content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 10, 2019 Why CCPA Needs Workflow December 10, 2019 Its January 1st and your first 5 CCPA SARs just came in from data how do you turn this around? What does it look like? The answer is Workflows. We learned with GDPR that DSARs need to be handled correctly, or there are massive consequences, that much is obvious.
